Text: Burned at 4x speed on a dvd-r and it works great; Thanks
can someone help.  When I try to burn this file it says no mountable disk.  I tried burning it at 4x but the wii does not recognize.  Please help!
download a free program called imgburn - it works great.  be sure to use DVD -r discs (not the +r and not +RW)

Or better yet - get a windows program = use Wii Backup Manager version 0.3.6 build 48 coded by Fig  (or newer )  it can read any FAT drive - and will auto transform your iso file into a wbfs - then you can use a usb stick or hard drive to play the game - no more disc needed.  (with configurable usb loader on your wii)
